properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 14 at 5:35AM EST until February 15 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Jackson KY
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Jackson Kentucky has issued a
Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky...

The South Fork Kentucky River at Booneville

The National Weather Service in Jackson Kentucky has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
The South Fork Kentucky River at Booneville.
* Until late tonight.
* At 5 AM Friday the stage was 26.8 feet.
* Bankfull stage is 24.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 27.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river is receding, but will continue to run high
through late this evning.
* At 27.0 feet...Low lying areas flood. The bridge at Upper Wolf
Creek Road, Shephards Lane, and the east end of Applegate Road at
Buck Creek are impassable..
properties.instruction:
Continue to monitor NOAA weather radio or your favorite local media
outlet for additional information. If you are in areas affected by
this forecast take necessary precautions.

The next update will be issued by 1 PM EST Friday.
